textos_fuente.text: Millennial Brewing Company - About Skip to main content Private Parties Drinks Our Events About BEER Catering Gift Cards Facebook page Instagram page Google page Facebook page Instagram page Google page Toggle navigation Private Parties Drinks Our Events About BEER Catering Gift Cards Millennial Brewing Company slideshow start stop playing Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 previous slide next slide Millennial Brewing Company About us Multi-tasking, connected, and tech-savvy are all terms used to describe the quintessential Millennial. ¬†So who are we? ¬†We are Millennials who have a dream. ¬†No different than all the generations before us, we seek to make a difference. ¬†To make an impact on the world through creating a one-of-a-kind community of beer lovers. ¬†We¬†pair passion with a strong work ethic and technology to create a singular craft beer and member¬†experience. ¬†Add to this a never-ending commitment to the community we love and there‚Äôs nothing we can‚Äôt do. ¬† 250+ local charities supported since 2017 and the number continues to grow. ¬† We won‚Äôt stop giving back. Ever. Kyle Cebull - Founder - I've loved beer for as long as I can remember.  Once I paired up with a skilled brewmaster, everything fell right into place.  I served our country for five years as a Sergeant in the USMC right outside Washington, DC.  I followed that up with 10 years of being immersed the SWFL business market, making connections, and helping people.  All of my previous experience with leadership and business lead me right into starting Millennial Brewing. I was born in Sandusky, OH (home of the famous Cedar Point) and moved to SWFL when I was six years old.  I have always loved Southwest Florida and appreciate it more each day.  I enjoy golfing, boating and hanging out at the beach with the family.  I have two beautiful children, Kyle Jr. and Amelie.  They are my motivation, my everything and my hope is to create something that they will be just as proud of as I am.  That's why Millennial Brewing exists.  To create more than just a group of "regulars" that hang out at the brewery, to create a singular community of people that are just as committed to the community and the art of brewing as we are.  In that way, and as a direct result of its community, Millennial Brewing will be unlike any other brewery in the world.  We are so excited to share our dream with each and every one of you. Millennial Brew Team Brewer ‚Äì Ralph Sprandel Jr. -The Millennial Brew team is like none other in the state.  Our Brewer, Ralph Sprandel Jr., is a self-taught, passionate curator of craft beer production.   He served our country in the United States Marine Corps, and then our community as a Lee County Sheriff Deputy.   Now, he expresses his love for beer right here in the Millennial brewhouse and crafts recipes that are true to style with his own unique flavor.   We are so excited to have him take the helm and lead us into the next evolution of our beverage offerings. Millennial Customer Experience Team - Our customer experience team leads the front of house operation with ease and skill.   Erin Williams applies her leadership experience in education and many years of hospitality experience to deftly maneuver the variety of service and event management elements of Millennial Brewing.  Stephanie Bilske brings to bear her vast amount of management and service experience within the craft beer industry every day delivering the absolute best customer experience and contributing to the never ending innovation with events, beer naming and more that is required to keep Millennial at the forefront of the craft beer scene in SWFL. Erin and Stephanie lead our front of house team of dynamic customer service dynamos and ensure every customer has a great time here at Millennial! Contact us: by phone (239)-271-2255, by email info@millennialbrewing.com Parties Catering

See below for the right contact and we‚Äôd love to answer that question for you! Private Events: events@parkwaybrewing.com For music/talent bookings, food trucks, or anything tasting room related: No Phone Calls Please, All Music Booking by Email ONLY kim@parkwaybrewing.com For¬† sales and distribution: grant@parkwaybrewing.com mike@parkwaybrewing.com For brewing, and general manager: mike@parkwaybrewing.com For office manager: mic@parkwaybrewing.com For invoices: accounts.payable@parkwaybrewing.com Share this: Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window) Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) Click to print (Opens in new window) Subscribe for Updates Search our Site Distinctive Beers Crafted With Care In The Heart Of The Blue Ridge parkwaybrewing.com 739 Kessler Mill Road Exit 141 on I-81, SALEM, VA 540-404-9810 kim@parkwaybrewing.com Facebook Twitter Instagram Brewery Hours Monday ‚Äì 2pm to 8pm Tuesday ‚Äì 2pm to 8pm Wednesday ‚Äì 2pm to 9pm Thursday ‚Äì 2pm to 9pm Friday ‚Äì 12pm to 9pm Saturday ‚Äì 12pm to 9pm Sunday ‚Äì 12pm to 8pm Holiday Closures: Christmas Day, New Years Day, Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day ¬© 2025 Parkway Brewing Co. | Custom Wordpress Development by William Alexander

About Us - Manhattan Brewing Company Skip to main content We use cookies to improve site performance and your experience. View our privacy policy for more information OK Go Home About Us Beers MBC Lounge MBC Catering The Brew Deck Join Our Team Shop Wing Wars Contact Us Our Story About Us We're ready to share our beers with Manhattan. With nearly 20 years of collective experience in the craft beer industry, we're focused on brewing and serving high-quality craft beers in a family-friendly atmosphere in the heart of downtown Manhattan. This town is our home, and we want to bring the best possible beer experience and education to the wonderful people of Manhattan. We want to create a place for everyone to come out and have a good time with friends and cultivate a craft beer culture Manhattan can be proud of. Our Team The best and brightest Co-Owners Portraits by Killian Millner Adam Krebsbach Brewer A native of Norton, Kansas, who moved to Manhattan in 2006, Adam's unrelenting creative energy has resulted in a tasty variety of imaginative beers. A tinkerer at heart, Adam is the yin to Garrett's yang; for every traditional style brewed by Garrett, you'll find Adam experimenting with an array of unique ingredients into his beers to challenge and delight beer fans. Adam loves drinking American pale ales, robust porters and Belgian tripels. Garrett Paulman Brewer A professionally trained brewer from the renowned Siebel Institute of Technology in Chicago, Garrett also brings experience in facility management and quality control. Garrett started brewing in 2011 before making the leap to attend Siebel and "turn pro" in 2012. You will find Garrett drinking anything hoppy while laughing with friends, family and strangers at the bar. Although he's a Nebraska native, Garrett, his wife and two children are K-State fans in training. Jake Voegeli Sales & Marketing A former K-State football player from Wichita, Kansas, who bleeds purple with his wife and daughter, Jake's journey into craft beer began in college after committing himself to trying a new six pack each week. Jake loves to challenge his palate with hoppy IPAs, sours and barrel-aged stouts, but also loves a well-crafted, delicate pilsner or a traditional English brown ale. An experienced salesman and marketer both in the craft beer and spirits industries, you'll mostly see Jake up front slinging beers or chatting with guests about beer, K-State football, his favorite Ryan Bingham album or his daughter Chloe. Keep up to date with Manhattan Brewing Company on twitter Follow Manhattan Brewing Company on facebook See what's going on at Manhattan Brewing Company on instagram Manhattan Brewing Company,
					406 Poyntz Ave,¬†Manhattan,¬†KS  66502 785-775-0406 Powered By Merlin¬Æ | Privacy Policy | Terms of Use Scroll to top of page

Millennial Brewing Company | Brewery & Private Event Venue Fort Myers √ó Let us host your special event! Whether a birthday party, office function or any other special occasion - we take care of all the fine details, bringing your event to life, just as you imagined. Each of our award-winning handcrafted nano brews is carefully curated and brewed with a dedication to flavor, detail, and the spirit of the times. Whether you‚Äôre sipping on a nostalgic throwback or trying a daring new blend, you‚Äôll taste the care we pour into every drop. Join us and experience the future of brews ‚Äì one nano batch at a time! Our drinks Groups and Parties Book your next party with us! Need the space for your event? Social Run Club Night - Every Thursday Thursday September 11th Every Thursday Join us every Thursday when Running Friends of SWFL meets for their weekly social run club event. A casual run/walk through beautiful Downtown Fort Myers with a new route each week featuring Downtowns most beautiful sights including bridge runs, park runs, and neighborhood runs! Open to all ages, all skill levels and pets are encouraged! Stay in the know for theme weeks and changes to the schedule are posted on Social Media! SWFL BURGER THROWDOWN Saturday September 13th SWFL BURGER THROWDOWN¬† ¬†Saturday, September 13 |¬†¬†12 PM ‚Äì 8 PM  Think you know the best burger in Southwest Florida? We‚Äôre putting it to the test! EIGHT of SWFL‚Äôs top food trucks and restaurants are going head-to-head in the ultimate burger battle. Juicy, creative, and downright delicious‚Äîonly one will walk away with the crown¬†¬†of Best Burger in SWFL.  ¬†Live entertainment ¬†Cold drinks flowing ¬†Burgers of every style imaginable ¬†Family-friendly, free to attend (pay for what you eat!)  Bring your appetite, bring your crew, and get ready to eat, vote, and celebrate the burger champions of SWFL. Who will you crown the winner?  ¬†RSVP now and tag your burger squad‚Äîthis is one showdown you don‚Äôt want to miss! Return of the Disco - Silent Disco Dance Party Saturday September 20th üé∂ 3 Channels. 1 Dance Floor. Endless Vibes. üé∂ üéß Silent Disco Dance Party @ Millennial üçª üìÖ Friday, September 20th üïó 8:00 PM ‚Äì 12:00 AM The¬†Return of the Disco¬†is here! üéâ For one night only, snag your headset for just¬†$5¬†and dive into the ultimate Silent Disco experience at¬†Millennial Brewing Company. Switch between¬†3 DJ channels¬†packed with nostalgia: ‚ú® 80s classics ‚ú® 90s throwbacks ‚ú® 2000s hits Hit the¬†air-conditioned warehouse dance floor, sip on¬†house craft beer, ciders, cocktails, or explore our¬†huge non-alcoholic menu¬†‚Äî the perfect fuel for a night of nonstop dancing. üìç Millennial Brewing Company üéü $5 headsets (special return price!) üéü 21+ to drink | All ages welcome Grab your crew, pick your channel, and let‚Äôs bring the disco back! 9th Annual Millennial Oktoberfest Friday October 3rd Runs until Sunday, October 5th, 2025 Just wait until you see the lineup of what we have planned for this year's EPIC OKTOBERFEST Event! Here's a taste of what's in store!!!  ¬†GERMAN FOOD COOKING COMPETITIONS ¬†MORE GERMAN CONTESTS (In addition to Steinhoisting, Cup Stack Contests, Beerlympics Events, and more more more) ¬†AUTHENTIC BAVARIAN PERFORMANCES ¬†MILLENNIAL DIRNDL GIRLS AND MORE!!!  PLUS + Our Full German Craft Beer Menu + Your Favorite Authentic German Family Food Vendors + Free Parking and Free Entry + Delicious German Dessert Vendors + and more! Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google five star review by Taylor A.: So far so good‚Ä¶place is HUGE with plenty to hear, see and touch and of course‚Ä¶quality brews. Typical games including a beer pong table are at your disposal as well as plenty of seating and a bar. Ahhh. The smell of a brewery! Cheers. Review by - Google five star review by Dr. Elijah T.: Place is expertly designed. Fridays they have a good truck rally with 4 or more trucks. They have memberships to get growler fills and add new beers each month.  They have lots of different themed days.  Sunday is family fun day with bounce house and water park for kids.  The place is kid and dog friendly. Review by - Google five star review by Shawn F.: Excellent brewery, cool space and events. They brew small 4 barrel batches so there are often new brews. Tables and cool wall are reclaimed wood and made by the employees. Grapefruit Hefeweizen is awesome. They're happy to give you samples, there's pinball, games, and pool. Hang out for a while! Review by - Google five star review by Paul S.: Great location and great brews‚Ä¶ We stoped by during the pandemic right when they opened and were able to get served right away. Friendly staff. Great selection of beer. They even have a food truck outside but happy to be of Indian style food‚Ä¶ It all looks very appetizing Newsletter Location 1811 Royal Palm Avenue Fort Myers, FL 33901 Located in Downtown Fort Myers, southwest from the intersection of Fowler & Second Street, right off Royal Palm Avenue close to Dr. MLK Jr. Blvd. Hours Tue, Wed 4:00 PM - 9:00 PM Thur, Fri 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM Sat 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM Sun 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM Find us on... Ever. Kyle Cebull - Founder - I've loved beer for as long as I can remember.  Once I paired up with a skilled brewmaster, everything fell right into place.  I served our country for five years as a Sergeant in the USMC right outside Washington, DC.  I followed that up with 10 years of being immersed the SWFL business market, making connections, and helping people.  All of my previous experience with leadership and business lead me right into starting Millennial Brewing. I was born in Sandusky, OH (home of the famous Cedar Point) and moved to SWFL when I was six years old.  I have always loved Southwest Florida and appreciate it more each day.  I enjoy golfing, boating and hanging out at the beach with the family.  I have two beautiful children, Kyle Jr. and Amelie.  They are my motivation, my everything and my hope is to create something that they will be just as proud of as I am.  That's why Millennial Brewing exists.  To create more than just a group of "regulars" that hang out at the brewery, to create a singular community of people that are just as committed to the community and the art of brewing as we are.  In that way, and as a direct result of its community, Millennial Brewing will be unlike any other brewery in the world.  We are so excited to share our dream with each and every one of you. Millennial Brew Team Brewer ‚Äì Ralph Sprandel Jr. -The Millennial Brew team is like none other in the state.  Our Brewer, Ralph Sprandel Jr., is a self-taught, passionate curator of craft beer production.   He served our country in the United States Marine Corps, and then our community as a Lee County Sheriff Deputy.   Now, he expresses his love for beer right here in the Millennial brewhouse and crafts recipes that are true to style with his own unique flavor.   We are so excited to have him take the helm and lead us into the next evolution of our beverage offerings. Millennial Customer Experience Team - Our customer experience team leads the front of house operation with ease and skill.   Erin Williams applies her leadership experience in education and many years of hospitality experience to deftly maneuver the variety of service and event management elements of Millennial Brewing.  Stephanie Bilske brings to bear her vast amount of management and service experience within the craft beer industry every day delivering the absolute best customer experience and contributing to the never ending innovation with events, beer naming and more that is required to keep Millennial at the forefront of the craft beer scene in SWFL. Erin and Stephanie lead our front of house team of dynamic customer service dynamos and ensure every customer has a great time here at Millennial!
